translation: Greater is their trouble whose minds are set on the unmanifested, for the goal of the unmanifested is very hard for the embodied to reach.
commentary: 12.5 Trouble the trouble? Mostly (is) greater? their of those? Avyaktasaktachetasam whose minds are set on the unmanifested? Avyakta the unmanifested? Hi for? Speed: goal? suffering pain? by the embodied by the embodied? avapyate is reached.Commentary Worshipers of the Saguna (alified) and the Nirguna (unalified) Brahman reach the same goal.
